name.japanese: スリラーバーク - 冷凍室

description: A massive freezer chamber deep within Thriller Bark where Gecko Moria stored the corpse of Oars, the ancient giant. The chamber is large enough to contain the 67-meter tall zombie and is kept at freezing temperatures to preserve the body.

keyEvents.title: Oars Revealed in the Freezer
keyEvents.description: Moria leads his subordinates into the freezer chamber to reveal Oars' preserved corpse, explaining the giant's history and significance.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of this location establishes it as the storage place for Moria's ultimate zombie weapon.

keyEvents.title: Oars' Resurrection
keyEvents.description: Moria uses his Kage Kage no Mi power in the freezer chamber to implant Luffy's shadow into Oars, bringing the ancient giant back to life.
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes the site of one of the most significant power demonstrations in the Thriller Bark arc.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Witness and Escape
keyEvents.description: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper witness Oars' resurrection from hiding and escape during the chaos of his awakening.
keyEvents.significance: The freezer becomes a crucial location where the Straw Hats learn about the Oars threat.

significance: Storage location for Moria's ultimate zombie project and the site of Oars' resurrection, making it a pivotal location in the Thriller Bark arc.

description: The world's largest pirate ship, serving as Gecko Moria's mobile fortress and zombie factory. It's a massive island-sized ship that resembles a haunted castle and contains various facilities including a freezer for storing special zombies.

keyEvents.title: Brook Reveals Zombie Weakness
keyEvents.description: Brook explains the weakness of zombies to Franky and Robin on Thriller Bark, sharing crucial tactical information.
keyEvents.significance: Provides the Straw Hats with knowledge needed to fight Moria's zombie army.

keyEvents.title: Brook Departs to Find Ryuma
keyEvents.description: Brook leaves Franky and Robin on Thriller Bark to pursue his goal of defeating Ryuma and reclaiming his shadow.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up Brook's subplot within the larger Thriller Bark conflict.

significance: Primary setting for the Thriller Bark arc and home base of Gecko Moria's zombie operations.
